title: fqdn
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

domain.description: The parent domain for the FQDN.

host.description: The host part of the FQDN.

issuffix.description: True if the FQDN is considered a suffix.

iszone.description: True if the FQDN is considered a zone.

zone.description: The zone level parent for this FQDN.
